title: IS IT POSSIBLE TO SEND A TICKET TO RIOT FOR PEOPLE WHO WENT AFK EVEN IF I FIND IT IN EVERY MY GAME??

replies.body:
IS YOUR CAPSLOCK BROKEN MATE.

and no.
you shouldn't bombard Riot with a bunch tickets when the post-game report works better and faster.
If you use the post-game report, that should suffice.

Ha-Ha-ha

You must be joking, or Rito used some kind of brainwashing machine on you :D

POSSIBLE RIOT GAMES AFK IN YOUR GAME FOR PEOPLE EVEN IF YOU SEND A TICKET TO FIND IT??

######On a less snarky note, I have no idea what you're trying to ask in your title.

It is possible, but the support is totally useless. I submitted a ticket about a Janna adc, following the toplaner, randomly ulting (with no enemies nearby) etc etc.. And she did not get punished.

So yes, you can submit a ticket, and no its doesn't matter at all.
LeaveBuster is automated system without needing to be reported unlike the IFS so sending ticket to Rito is about 2 steps too far (in-game report and support ticket)
LeaverBuster should get them, unless theyâ€™re not AFK but just sitting in the fountain - THEN a ticket would make sense.
